column5: Anyone know of a reputable Honda outboard dealer in Canada that would be close to the Port Erie crossing? Any suggestions would be appreciated. mariner227 Charter Member #193
Try these links and see if they help at all.http://www.bridgeyachts.com/http://www.honda.ca/MarineEng/Dealer....htm?areaid=51
I was hoping to get some suggestions from people who had first hand experience with a good Honda Dealer close to the border. mariner Charter Member #193
